about_the_game:
Make a statement with the Fiskespro Gear Pack! This pack contains the stained-glass Vredesbringaren Rod and the lavish Härskaren Reel, available in three color variations each, as well as three spinner lures.

Fiskespro Gear Pack includes:

• 1 Vredesbringaren Rod: Vredesbringaren, Vredesbringaren Fettisdagen, Vredesbringaren Långfredagen
• 1 Härskaren Reel: Härskaren, Härskaren Midsommarkransen, Härskaren Aspudden
• 3 spinner lures: Sizes 7, 4, and 1
detailed_description:
Make a statement with the Fiskespro Gear Pack! This pack contains the stained-glass Vredesbringaren Rod and the lavish Härskaren Reel, available in three color variations each, as well as three spinner lures.

Fiskespro Gear Pack includes:

• 1 Härskaren Reel: Härskaren, Härskaren Midsommarkransen, Härskaren Aspudden
• 3 spinner lures: Sizes 7, 4, and 1
